note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income (measured after taxes and benefits) or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Share living on less than $8.30 a day vs. mean income or consumption
subtitle: The poverty line of $8.30 per day is set by the World Bank to be representative of the definitions of poverty adopted in upper-middle-income countries. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.

display.name: Mean income or consumption per day
